title: Oh, gee whiz. I wonder why mobile #LCSBIGPLAYS champs like yasuo and zed are popular with the kids?
body:
http://i.imgur.com/UZzp2hd.png
Oh right, Riot is turning everything into a skillshot, and turned the game into a button smashing skillfest where whoever eats the most cheetos and drinks the most mountain dew wins the game.
You have a PH.D and a IQ of 300? Well tough luck, drink more mountain dew and carry yourself to to challengers because let's face it we all know masters is a big middle finger to the diamond 3 and below. Pfft and you call this game a sport? You dont even drug test for and allow players to take illegal substances that will allow them to smash buttons faster than Yasuo's Q going off CD.

Riot seriously needs to stop turning everything into high mobile skillshot #LCSBIGPLAYS.

replies.body:
I tried reading this and was met with an adamant wall of pure nonsense.

What does this unlabeled graph _mean_?

What does mountain dew have to do the fact that kids think playing edgy, "high" skill champions make them edgy and skilled?

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3UPzl7ta,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-03T19:51:42.292+0000)
>
> I tried reading this and was met with an adamant wall of pure nonsense.
> 
> What does this unlabeled graph _mean_?
> 
> What does mountain dew have to do the fact that kids think playing edgy, "high" skill champions make them edgy and skilled?

Clearly someone who is high on Moutain Dew will have an advantage when playing a champ like {{champion:157}} or {{champion:429}} 

http://i.imgur.com/Uxm2lrj.png[/img]
Your move.

I dont even understand the point you are trying to make

Something about Mountain Dew? What?
This is borderline gibberish. What am i reading.

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3UPzl7ta,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-03T19:49:04.055+0000)
>
> This is borderline gibberish. What am i reading.

The truth about the current state of the game.
